metadata.feature_description: Configure pagination size for content lists across social modules with options from 5 to 100 items per page.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify dropdown shows all available page size options

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings page loads with Page Size section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings page loaded successfully showing Influence section and Miscellaneous Community Settings

steps.action: Click on Page Size dropdown to expand options
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing all 6 options: 5 Items, 10 Items, 15 Items, 25 Items, 50 Items, 100 Items

steps.action: Check initial value of Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Page Size dropdown showed '5 Items' as the default selected value

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set page size to 100 items and save

steps.action: Select '100 items' from the Page Size dropdown

steps.expected: Settings saved successfully with confirmation message
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully. 'Item successfully saved.' message appeared

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set page size to 50 items and save

steps.action: Select '50 items' from the Page Size dropdown

steps.actual: Settings saved successfully with success notification

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save page size and verify persistence

steps.action: Set Page Size to 100 items and save
Reload page and navigate back to Community Settings
steps.expected: Page Size should still show 100 items
steps.actual: After page reload and navigating back to Community Settings, Page Size dropdown showed '100 Items' confirming persistence

observations: The Page Size dropdown correctly displays all 6 options as defined in the HTML template: 5, 10, 15, 25, 50, and 100 items
There is also a separate Comments Page Size dropdown with the same options
The settings are saved via the CommunitySettingsController SaveSettings API endpoint
Settings persistence was verified - values are correctly retained after page reload
